actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-719, by Ms. Slaughter.

The resolution waives a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of any resolution reported on the legislative day of June 19, 2008, providing for consideration or disposition of a measure making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2008.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 238.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1281.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

summary.text: Waives a specified requirement of Rule XIII (Calendar and Committee Reports) to allow consideration or disposition of a measure (making supplemental appropriations for FY2008) on the same day it is presented to the House.

titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
